alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 11:49AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Buffalo and Sherman Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mason City to near Miller. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and dime sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Litchfield around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pleasanton, Ravenna, Loup City, Hazard and Poole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
